title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 481.2 - Who must pay
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 481.2 - Who must pay

State Regulations

Program fees must be paid by each person: (a) required to obtain a permit, certificate
or approval pursuant to a State environmental regulatory program; or
(b) subject to regulation under a State
environmental regulatory program; each year, commencing April 1, 1983. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
481.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
